author: p...i
content_pl:
Konsola zapakowana dosc kiepsko. Bardziej jak toster niz sprzet elektroniczny.
Same doswiadczenia dosc mieszane. Fajnie sie gra, bo mozna za abonament wiele tytulow ograc, bez zakupow.
Jednak konsola nie oferuje w abonamencie nowych gier (poza ratchet and clank). Tak same tytuly z PS4. Porownujac to z moim Xboxem i GamePassem, wyglada to dosc kiepsko. 
No i sprawa napedu, sklep i producent zapewniali ze bez problemu na premiere dotrze do mnie konsola i osobny naped. Naped sie nie pojawil, sklep nie ma zadnego na stanie, Sony w Europie tez zadnego nie ma. No i co robic? Uzywki kosztuja 100-150 PLN zazwyczaj, a nowe gry 300-399 PLN w sklepie Playstation. Z Promocjami do 200 schodza. 
Kiepski zart. Konsole zwrocilem, zamowilem PS5 Slim z napedem. Roznic w wydajnosci za bardzo nie ma. Kiedy robilem upgrade z ps4 do ps4 pro bylem mega zadowolony ze zmiany i przez lata ogralem wszystkie dobre tytuly. Na PS5 swietnych tytulow nie ma za bardzo.

Jest jeszcze sprawa DualShocka. Cudowny kontroler, minus jedynie ze akumuator wewnetrzny bez mozliwosci wymiany baterii i slynny drift w stickach. Ale same doswiadczenia z kontrolerem swietne (glosnik, adaptive triggers, mikrofon robia wrazenie).

Konsola tez jest porownywalnie glosna co PS4 Pro. Nie ma tragedii, ale sa cichsze konsole :).
I to kolejna generacja konsol, ktore mimo zapewnien producentow nie maja 4K 60PFS, ba nawet 4k30fps nie ma. Jest za to upscaling z 1080p lub 1440p (2k)
content_en:
The console is packed quite poorly. More like a toaster than electronic equipment.
The experiences are quite mixed. It is nice to play, because you can go to the subscription for a lot of titles, without purchases.
However, the console does not offer new games in the subscription (except Ratchet and Clank). Same titles from PS4. Comparing it with my xbox and gamepass, it looks quite bad. 
And the tribute, the store and the manufacturer assured that the console and a separate drive would easily reach me at the premiere. The drive has not appeared, the store has no Sony, there is no Sony in Europe. What to do? Utilities cost PLN 100-150 usually, and new games PLN 300-399 in the PlayStation store. With promotions up to 200. 
Poor joke. I returned the consoles, ordered PS5 Slim with a drive. There is not much difference in performance. When I made upgrade from PS4 to PS4 Pro, I was very happy with the change and for years I looked at all good titles. There are not too much on PS5.

There is still a dualshock case. A wonderful controller, minus only from an internal battery without the possibility of changing batteries and a famous drift in Sticks. But the experience with the controller great (speaker, adaptive triggers, the microphone impresses).

The console is also comparable to the PS4 Pro. There is no tragedy, but there are quieter consoles :).
And this is another generation of consoles, which despite the provision of producers do not have 4K 60pfs, even 4K30FPS does not have. Instead, there is upscaling with 1080p or 1440p (2K)

author: p...i
content_pl:
Konsola zapakowana dosc kiepsko. Bardziej jak toster niz sprzet elektroniczny.
Same doswiadczenia dosc mieszane. Fajnie sie gra, bo mozna za abonament wiele tytulow ograc, bez zakupow.
Jednak konsola nie oferuje w abonamencie nowych gier (poza ratchet and clank). Tak same tytuly z PS4. Porownujac to z moim Xboxem i GamePassem, wyglada to dosc kiepsko. 
No i sprawa napedu, sklep i producent zapewniali ze bez problemu na premiere dotrze do mnie konsola i osobny naped. Naped sie nie pojawil, sklep nie ma zadnego na stanie, Sony w Europie tez zadnego nie ma. No i co robic? Uzywki kosztuja 100-150 PLN zazwyczaj, a nowe gry 300-399 PLN w sklepie Playstation. Z Promocjami do 200 schodza. 
Kiepski zart. Konsole zwrocilem, zamowilem PS5 Slim z napedem. Roznic w wydajnosci za bardzo nie ma. Kiedy robilem upgrade z ps4 do ps4 pro bylem mega zadowolony ze zmiany i przez lata ogralem wszystkie dobre tytuly. Na PS5 swietnych tytulow nie ma za bardzo.

Jest jeszcze sprawa DualShocka. Cudowny kontroler, minus jedynie ze akumuator wewnetrzny bez mozliwosci wymiany baterii i slynny drift w stickach. Ale same doswiadczenia z kontrolerem swietne (glosnik, adaptive triggers, mikrofon robia wrazenie).

Konsola tez jest porownywalnie glosna co PS4 Pro. Nie ma tragedii, ale sa cichsze konsole :).
I to kolejna generacja konsol, ktore mimo zapewnien producentow nie maja 4K 60PFS, ba nawet 4k30fps nie ma. Jest za to upscaling z 1080p lub 1440p (2k)
content_en:
The console is packed quite poorly. More like a toaster than electronic equipment.
The experiences are quite mixed. It is nice to play, because you can go to the subscription for a lot of titles, without purchases.
However, the console does not offer new games in the subscription (except Ratchet and Clank). Same titles from PS4. Comparing it with my xbox and gamepass, it looks quite bad. 
And the tribute, the store and the manufacturer assured that the console and a separate drive would easily reach me at the premiere. The drive has not appeared, the store has no Sony, there is no Sony in Europe. What to do? Utilities cost PLN 100-150 usually, and new games PLN 300-399 in the PlayStation store. With promotions up to 200. 
Poor joke. I returned the consoles, ordered PS5 Slim with a drive. There is not much difference in performance. When I made upgrade from PS4 to PS4 Pro, I was very happy with the change and for years I looked at all good titles. There are not too much on PS5.

There is still a dualshock case. A wonderful controller, minus only from an internal battery without the possibility of changing batteries and a famous drift in Sticks. But the experience with the controller great (speaker, adaptive triggers, the microphone impresses).

The console is also comparable to the PS4 Pro. There is no tragedy, but there are quieter consoles :).
And this is another generation of consoles, which despite the provision of producers do not have 4K 60pfs, even 4K30FPS does not have. Instead, there is upscaling with 1080p or 1440p (2K)

author: p...i
content_pl:
Konsola zapakowana dosc kiepsko. Bardziej jak toster niz sprzet elektroniczny.
Same doswiadczenia dosc mieszane. Fajnie sie gra, bo mozna za abonament wiele tytulow ograc, bez zakupow.
Jednak konsola nie oferuje w abonamencie nowych gier (poza ratchet and clank). Tak same tytuly z PS4. Porownujac to z moim Xboxem i GamePassem, wyglada to dosc kiepsko. 
No i sprawa napedu, sklep i producent zapewniali ze bez problemu na premiere dotrze do mnie konsola i osobny naped. Naped sie nie pojawil, sklep nie ma zadnego na stanie, Sony w Europie tez zadnego nie ma. No i co robic? Uzywki kosztuja 100-150 PLN zazwyczaj, a nowe gry 300-399 PLN w sklepie Playstation. Z Promocjami do 200 schodza. 
Kiepski zart. Konsole zwrocilem, zamowilem PS5 Slim z napedem. Roznic w wydajnosci za bardzo nie ma. Kiedy robilem upgrade z ps4 do ps4 pro bylem mega zadowolony ze zmiany i przez lata ogralem wszystkie dobre tytuly. Na PS5 swietnych tytulow nie ma za bardzo.

Jest jeszcze sprawa DualShocka. Cudowny kontroler, minus jedynie ze akumuator wewnetrzny bez mozliwosci wymiany baterii i slynny drift w stickach. Ale same doswiadczenia z kontrolerem swietne (glosnik, adaptive triggers, mikrofon robia wrazenie).

Konsola tez jest porownywalnie glosna co PS4 Pro. Nie ma tragedii, ale sa cichsze konsole :).
I to kolejna generacja konsol, ktore mimo zapewnien producentow nie maja 4K 60PFS, ba nawet 4k30fps nie ma. Jest za to upscaling z 1080p lub 1440p (2k)
content_en:
The console is packed quite poorly. More like a toaster than electronic equipment.
The experiences are quite mixed. It is nice to play, because you can go to the subscription for a lot of titles, without purchases.
However, the console does not offer new games in the subscription (except Ratchet and Clank). Same titles from PS4. Comparing it with my xbox and gamepass, it looks quite bad. 
And the tribute, the store and the manufacturer assured that the console and a separate drive would easily reach me at the premiere. The drive has not appeared, the store has no Sony, there is no Sony in Europe. What to do? Utilities cost PLN 100-150 usually, and new games PLN 300-399 in the PlayStation store. With promotions up to 200. 
Poor joke. I returned the consoles, ordered PS5 Slim with a drive. There is not much difference in performance. When I made upgrade from PS4 to PS4 Pro, I was very happy with the change and for years I looked at all good titles. There are not too much on PS5.

There is still a dualshock case. A wonderful controller, minus only from an internal battery without the possibility of changing batteries and a famous drift in Sticks. But the experience with the controller great (speaker, adaptive triggers, the microphone impresses).

The console is also comparable to the PS4 Pro. There is no tragedy, but there are quieter consoles :).
And this is another generation of consoles, which despite the provision of producers do not have 4K 60pfs, even 4K30FPS does not have. Instead, there is upscaling with 1080p or 1440p (2K)
